short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A clean and effective offline calendar. LESS IS MORE.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Offline: You can use it without Internet connection
- Private: All data is stored in your personal Google Account
- Clean: No any miscellaneous functions
